abilities.name: Momentum
abilities.desc: Every 2 squares +d6 to your next roll. These dice disappear at the end of your turn.
abilities.exhaust: Trigger Juggernaut and double your movement this turn

abilities.name: Fury
abilities.desc: Gain the Fury tag each time an enemy Action succeeds against you (max 6)

tags.name: Fury
tags.desc: d6 against every enemy action against you

abilities.name: Retribution

abilities.exhaust: As a free action, trigger Retribution and +2 Retribution tags

tags.name: Retribution
tags.exhaust: Explode a die of you or an ally within Close range

abilities.exhaust: Trigger Blood lust on you and up to Force/Heart characters
